pr_title: Revert Surefire Version Change, Misc Configuration Cleanup

timeline.message: Revert version change of surefire due to issues introduced in running tests, cleaned up configuration in parent POMs so inappropriate configurations won't be inheritted by children POMs

timeline.bodyText:
The parent pom had these two additional lines. Those should be copied to this pom as well.
<configurationAPIEnvironmentFound>environmentConfiguration</configurationAPIEnvironmentFound>	
<configurationAPIUseRuntimeFirst>environmentConfiguration</configurationAPIUseRuntimeFirst>
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: These were being used in tests for Azure Core, will update those tests to no longer require these configurations.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.message: Update Configuration and ConfigurationTests to remove Maven surefire environment variables and system properties
